test.sql: SELECT SUM( CASE WHEN EXISTS (SELECT * FROM Orders o WHERE o.EmployeeID = e.EmployeeID) THEN 0 ELSE 1 END ) FROM Employees e

expectedError.text: Cannot perform aggregate function on an expression containing a subquery: "SUM"(CASE WHEN EXISTS ( SELECT "o"."OrderID" AS "OrderID", "o"."CustomerID" AS "CustomerID", "o"."EmployeeID" AS "EmployeeID", "o"."OrderDate" AS "OrderDate", "o"."RequiredDate" AS "RequiredDate", "o"."ShippedDate" AS "ShippedDate", "o"."ShipVia" AS "ShipVia", "o"."Freight" AS "Freight", "o"."ShipName" AS "ShipName", "o"."ShipAddress" AS "ShipAddress", "o"."ShipCity" AS "ShipCity", "o"."ShipRegion" AS "ShipRegion", "o"."ShipPostalCode" AS "ShipPostalCode", "o"."ShipCountry" AS "ShipCountry" FROM Orders AS o WHERE "o"."EmployeeID" = "e"."EmployeeID") THEN 0 ELSE 1 END).
